H0.text: Colin Meads, nicknamed 'Pinetree', a former rugby union footballer who played 55 test matches for his national team from 1957 until 1971 and was named his country's Player of the Century, represented which country. Australia

A4.text: Colin Earl Meads was born in the town of Cambridge in the Waikato region.

A5.text: He was named the country's Player of the Century at the NZRFU Awards in 1999.
